Projects

This has been My Journey So Far ...

üèÅ  Where it began December 2020

My interest in coding began with my older brother, who has told me a lot about it since early 2019, but at the time I didn't think too much of it since I thought I would be too dumb to participate.
However... in December of 2020, I decided to join a course for web development basics on Coursera

‚ù§Ô∏è The Genesis of my Passion for Coding and Technology 1st Feb 2021

At last! I've finished my first course about coding. On February the second, I completed Coursera's course "HTML, CSS, and Javascript for Web Developers" with a 100% for all my assignments. That's when I first started becoming excited about coding because it's when I realized that I could at least do some of the things involved with coding.

üñ•Ô∏è CodeCademy 5th Feb 2021

After completing the previously mentioned course from Coursera, I started learning to code through Codecademy. I joined them in December of 2020 but didn't start with the Fullstack course yet, as I wanted to complete what I had started with on Coursera.
The first few classes on CodeCademy were very different from Coursera, and much more difficult, but me being the person that I am, I saw it as a challenge and it piqued my interest even more.

‚ö†Ô∏è  First Fun but Challenging project 7th Apr 2021

On this day I completed a project which caused me a lot of headaches at the time. Project name = Mixed Messages.
The goal for this project was to use my javascript skills to make a random string generator that pulls data from three different sources. The three different sources I used are three arrays. One with jokes, one with songs, and one with funny quotes I got from the internet that are generated by A.I. The project's tasks did not include the need to use HTML and CSS, but I incorporated these technologies to challenge my skills.

üß™  Experimenting with CSS 31st May 2021

I started playing around with FlexBox and completed a project I was tasked to do by Codecademy.
For this project, I had to create a company of my choice and create a responsive website for said company/business. I had to do this using only responsive units and Flexbox. I chose to go with a photographer's website as it would show off Flexbox's attributes best. This is a project very near and dear to me because it was my first project that had very cool styling added to it. I do plan on improving this project in the future, but right now I have a couple of really rad ideas that I want to work on first... So stay tuned!!!

ü§Ø ReactJs === Unlimited POWER! 2 Jun 2021

After completing my testing with Flexbox, I started doing a project with CSS Grid.
In this project I gathered images from SoundCloud (for the song cover images) and unsplash(the banner/hero images). I decided to make up a dj name and make a very basic website for him. Needless to say, I will forever use CSS Grid.
